changeSet.author: jhipster
changeSet.createView: select t.id,t.status,t.memo, box.frozen_box_code,box.sample_type_name, task.id as task_id,task.stock_out_task_code as task_code, plan.id as plan_id,plan.stock_out_plan_code as plan_code, ap.id as apply_id,ap.apply_code as apply_code, ap.delegate_id,de.delegate_name as delegate,t.equipment_code,t.area_code,t.support_rack_code,t.columns_in_shelf,t.rows_in_shelf, (select count(tube.id) from stock_out_req_frozen_tube tube where tube.stock_out_frozen_box_id = t.id and tube.status!='2203') as count_of_sample, (t.equipment_code||'.'||t.area_code||'.'||t.support_rack_code || '.'||t.columns_in_shelf||lpad(t.rows_in_shelf,2,0)) as position from stock_out_box t left join frozen_box box on t.frozen_box_id = box.id left join stock_out_task task on t.stock_out_task_id = task.id left join stock_out_plan plan on task.stock_out_plan_id = plan.id left join stock_out_apply ap on plan.stock_out_apply_id = ap.id left join delegate de on de.id = ap.delegate_id where t.status='1702'
